title.rendered: Sale Ends MONDAY! + Fall DIY Books

content.rendered:
Sale Ends Monday!

 

 

Special Hours on November 14th

We will be open from 12:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. at all Gottwals Books locations on Monday, November 14th. We will be closed that morning due to staff training.  Our entire crew will be gathered together all morning in efforts to make our store operations better and better!

 

Toy Feature: Melissa & Doug® Pasture Pals

These adorable horses are an annual popular seller. The figurines engage children tactilely with a velvet-like coat and realistic manes and tails. Plus, they come in their own colorfully crafted storage crate.

 

Book Feature: Knitting & Crafts

Chilly fall and winter days are around the corner!  Check out our knitting and crafts sections for fun DIY ideas that can be done in the cozy indoors.

 

FREE t-shirt!

Don’t miss out on this great deal! Get a FREE t-shirt with a purchase of Battlefield Earth. Offer exclusive to the Warner Robins location.

excerpt.rendered: Only a few days left of our 20% off toy sale.
